scenes.action_text: THE BOONDOCK SAINTS Written by TROY DUFFY Shooting Script: White August 28, 1997 INT. GOTHIC CHURCH 10:00 A.M. ST. PATRICK'S DAY DOWNTOWN BOSTON As we open we see the inside of an enormous church. A young looking PRIEST in his mid-thirties is finishing the delivery of the Lordï¿½s Prayer.
